name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: Don't Miss The Super Cycle | Raoul Pal & Joe McCann
text:
Synopsis
The current business cycle may extend through the end of 2025 or Q1 2026, with potential for a final market explosion similar to the 2017 crypto market dynamics, suggesting investors should be cautious about exiting risk assets prematurely.

Key Insights
- The ISM survey is currently below 50, indicating the business cycle has barely started its upward trajectory
- Market participants have lingering PTSD from the 2021 market cycle, which peaked in March due to massive 2020 stimulus
- The speaker predicts investors may exit risk assets too early, potentially missing a significant market expansion
- The anticipated market cycle could potentially extend to the end of 2025 or Q1 2026
- The speaker anticipates a potential market dynamic similar to the 2017 "final explosion" in asset prices
